name: Janus Henderson Group PLC
goal: Janus Henderson exists to help clients achieve their long-term financial goals.  In order to achieve this we seek to positively influence EU legislative affairs impacting our end investors.
interests: Banking and financial services, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives:
• Alternative Investment Fund Managers Directive (AIFMD)
• Anti-Money Laundering Directive (MLD) IV / V
• Benchmarks Regulation
• Capital Requirements Directive (CRD) IV
• Capital Markets Union (CMU)
• Central Securities Depositories Regulation (CSDR)
• Corporate Governance
• European Market Infrastructure Regulation (EMIR)
• Financial Transactions Tax (FTT)
• General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
• Institutions for Occupational Retirement Pensions Directive (IORP) II
• Investor Compensation Scheme Directive (ICSD)
• Investment Firms Prudential Review
• Market Abuse Directive (MAD) II
• Market Abuse Regulation (MAR)
• Markets in Financial Instruments Directive (MiFID) II
• Markets in Financial Instruments Regulation (MiFIR)
• Non-Bank Non-Insurer Global Systemically Important Financial Institutions (NBNI G-SIFIs)
• Packaged Retail and Insurance-Based Investment Products Regulation (PRIIPS)
• Prospectus Regulation
• Recovery and Resolution of Non-Bank Financial Institutions, including clearinghouses (CCPs)
• Securities Financing Transaction Regulation (SFTR)
• Securitisation Regulation
• Shadow Banking
• Shareholder Rights Directive (SRD2)
• Short Selling Regulation (SSR)
• Solvency II Directive
• Transparency Directive (TD) II
• Undertakings for Collective Investment in Transferable Securities Directive (UCITS) V
• The United Kingdom's exit from the European Union
